title: Zombie Survival
description: Zombie Survival is a survival game where you must protect your home from the zombie's attack at all costs! Shoot the zombies through your home windows and repair the broken ones to slow down the invaders. Unlock new rooms to enhance your defense area, and don't forget to upgrade your weapon to handle the increasing number of zombies at each wave. Avoid getting stuck in the corners, or the zombie will eat your brain!
